name: Antoine Poinsot
cooked: After re-reading through the arguments presented in this thread i’m leaning toward including the invalidity of 64 bytes transactions as part of the consensus cleanup proposal. I appreciate Eric’s push back against some of the advertised benefits (my caching assumptions being incorrect and the bandwidth reduction in absolute terms being modest). Still i think the actual benefits, mostly in terms of reduced complexity for SPV applications, outweigh the cost.
